trans-unit.source: As a HealthTap Medical Expert, you are required to register with and use your real name and (if you choose to upload a picture) a real image of you in your Virtual Practice.
trans-unit.target: 作为HealthTap医疗专家，您需要在您的在线咨询中注册并使用您的真实姓名和（如果您选择上传图片）真实的形象。

trans-unit.source: Licensed doctors may apply to be and participate as Medical Experts on HealthTap. Physicians whose licenses are or become suspended or revoked, for any reason, are not permitted and agree not to participate in any way, including but not limited to submitting Content to HealthTap, as a Medical Expert on HealthTap. HealthTap may expand the network to include other licensed medical experts.
trans-unit.target: 执业医师可以申请并作为医学专家加入HealthTap。许可证被许可因任何原因或被吊销或撤销的医生是不允许申请，也同意不以任何方式参与，包括将内容提交到HealthTap作为HealthTap的医疗专家也不被允许。HealthTap可以扩展网络以包括其他授权的医学专家

trans-unit.source: You retain the right to edit and delete your own Expert Submissions that appear in your Virtual Practice at any time. You also retain the right to use and create derivative works from your own Expert Submissions elsewhere (such as on your own practice website, blog, or in your own social media posts).
trans-unit.target: 您保留随时编辑和删除您的在线咨询中显示的专家提交的权利。您同样也拥有从您自己的专家意见书的其他地方（如在您自己的实践网站，博客，或在您自己的社交媒体网站）使用和创建衍生作品的权利。

trans-unit.source: When a HealthTap Medical Expert submissions related to any HealthTap feature or function and made for publication on HealthTap (such as an answer to a question) (an "Expert Submission"), you grant HealthTap an unrestricted right without limitation to use, reproduce, extract data from or add data to, publish and post any such Expert Submissions, including in connection with or on HealthTap, including in connection with your name. This means that when you make such a submission to us, you are giving us rights to this content, including the right to post it on HealthTap and use it in connection with HealthTap. You also give us the right to give or transfer all rights granted herein to others. While Expert Submissions generally are posted to HealthTap, we do not have an obligation to post any particular Expert Submission on HealthTap and reserve the right, at our sole discretion and for any reason whatsoever (including but not limited to an Expert Submission being reported to us), to not post and/or to remove any Expert Submissions at any time.
trans-unit.target: 当一位HealthTap的医学专家的提交文件与任何HealthTap的特性或作用有关并在HealthTap上（作为问题的回复）、（专家回应）发布，您已同意并授权HealthTap无限制地使用、复制、从中提取或添加数据后发布任何包括与HealthTap或您的名字连接的专家意见。这意味着，当您做出这样的提交给我们的同时，您给我们包括有权发布在HealthTap或使用它与HealthTap链接的权利。您也给我们权利授予或转让再此授予他人的所有权利。专家的意见一般都公布到HealthTap，我们没有义务在HealthTap上特别公布某位专家的意见并保留其权利。以我们的判断和以任何理由（包括但不限于专家提交的报告给我们），不发布或随时删除任何专家的意见。

trans-unit.source: So that everyone can enjoy HealthTap, we have rules for Content in Public Areas. A few things you should know:
trans-unit.target: 为了让大家可以更好地使用HealthTap，我们有公共区域内容的规则。您应该知道的几件事：

trans-unit.source: HealthTap answers should be relevant content that is educational and informational. Answers can provide general guidance, context, and illustration. You are welcome to refer to general medical conditions, symptoms and treatments, but please do not diagnose any individual member or prescribe any specific treatment in your answers. Individualized or diagnostic answers are not allowed and prescribing medications is not allowed. Answers should not provide specific treatment recommendations or give the impression that they are a substitute for a real-life consultation with a doctor. YOU ARE NOT PERMITTED TO PRACTICE MEDICINE ON OR THROUGH HEALTHTAP, EVEN IF YOU ARE INTERACTING WITH AN ACTUAL PATIENT OF YOURS. ALL MEDICAL DIAGNOSIS, TREATMENT, PRESCRIPTION AND ACTUAL CARE MUST OCCUR OFF HEALTHTAP, REGARDLESS OF ANY EXISTING RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN THE PARTIES.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的答案应该是与教育和信息相关的内容。答案可以提供一般指导，情况和说明。欢迎您参考一般的医疗状况，症状和治疗方法，但请不要以您的答案来诊断任何个人会员或规定任何特定的治疗。个性化或判断性的答案是不被允许的，并且处方药物是不允许的。答案不应该提供特定的治疗建议或给人留下他们能代替现实生活中向医生咨询的印象。您不允许通过HEALTHTAP行医，即使您是与您实际的病人进行交流。所有医疗诊断，治疗，处方和实际护理都不被允许在HEALTHTAP上发生，无论任何现有的关系之间的缔约方。

trans-unit.source: Feel free to interact professionally with members and create long-lasting relationships with those in your community. However, help us keep the personal information of our members confidential. Please don’t refer to members in or on Content in Public Areas by their real names, even if this information has been disclosed to you.
trans-unit.target: 您可以随时专门与会员进行交流并且可以与您社区里的人创造持久的关系。但是，帮助我们保守我们会员的个人信息。请不要在公共领域的内容中用会员的真实姓名提及他们，即使这些信息已经向您公开。

trans-unit.source: Responses should always be appropriate. Brief, casual, and friendly responses are the most useful. Help HealthTap remain a trusted resource, by avoiding potentially offensive content whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: 回复应该总是适当的。简短，非正式和友好的反应是最有用的。通过尽可能的避免潜在的攻击性内容，帮助HealthTap保持为值得信赖的资源。

trans-unit.source: Feel Free to share your professional clinical expertise though answers that are evidence-based and consistent with accepted standards in the medical community. HealthTap is for general questions. Refrain from using language that suggests an answer is provided for a single member. Unless you are in a Private Conversation with a user on HealthTap, refrain from answering questions that solicit your individual opinion as a single Medical Expert. Avoid answering questions or providing answers that suggest a duty of care and a doctor-patient relationship.
trans-unit.target: 自由地分享您的专业临床专业知识，当然那是基于证据和符合医疗界的公认标准内。HealthTap是为一般性问题。避免使用那些能够表明答案是由一个会员提供的语言。除非您是以私人谈话的形式与一个用户在HealthTap交流，否则作为一个医学专家避免回答那些征求您个人意见的问题。避免回答问题或提供关于照顾的义务和医生与患者关系的建议。

trans-unit.source: You are allowed to link to external websites that are both appropriate and related to your responses, but answers on HealthTap should be complete and should not be used for primarily promotional purposes. Please do not plagiarize and cite sources where applicable. Using answers as a vehicle to promote a product or service is prohibited. Providing members with useful and beneficial information and attracting new patients through useful Content is permitted, but mere schilling is not.
trans-unit.target: 您可以链接到适当的并且和您的回应相关的外部网站上，但在HealthTap上的答案应该完成，并且不应该用作主要以促销为目的。请不要剽窃和适用的引用来源。禁止使用答案作为宣传产品或服务的工具。为会员提供有用的并且有益的信息，通过被允许的有用的内容来吸引新病人，但仅仅是先令并非如此。

trans-unit.source: Patients on HealthTap can find your professional contact information through your Virtual Practice, and can contact you for an appointment. However, please avoid violating medical board rules regarding advertising and patient solicitation.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap的患者可以通过在线咨询找到您的专业联系信息，并且可以通过预约联系您。然而，请避免违反医学委员会关于广告和病人征集的规定。

trans-unit.source: Avoid other actions that violate board or other rules that apply to you.
trans-unit.target: 避免其他违反董事会的行为或适用于您的其他规则。

trans-unit.source: All other information, including suggestions, feedback, ideas, concepts and any other materials you disclose or offer to us on or in connection with HealthTap or any Content, are governed by the general member submission terms of this Agreement. This means that these submissions are made without any restrictions and without any expectation of confidentiality or compensation. You agree not to assert any property right or moral right of any kind with respect to any such submissions. You agree to our standard terms governing media submissions, except for the prohibition against uploading a facial portrait image of yourself for your Virtual Practice picture.
trans-unit.target: 包括建议、反馈、想法、概念和其他您披露或提供给我们的材料或与HealthTap相关的或由普通会员提交的本协议条款的任何内容，在内的所有其他信息。这意味着这些提交是没有任何限制,也没有任何保密或补偿期望的。您同意对这样的提交不维护任何产权或任何形式的道德权利。您同意我们的标准条款执政媒体投稿，除了禁止我们对你自己上传的脸部肖像图像的在线咨询的图片的使用。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap permits Medical Experts to receive questions directly from specific members in Private Conversations. You will receive compensation for participating in Private Conversations according to the additional terms of the [HealthTap License Agreement and Business Associate Agreement], which are incorporated herein by reference.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap允许医学专家直接在私人的谈话收到特定会员所提的问题。根据附加条款[HealthTap的许可协议和业务合作协议]，您将收到补偿通过加入私人的谈话，所有这一切都被引入作为参考。

trans-unit.source: Medical Experts may not post Content to Public Areas on HealthTap in exchange for compensation of any kind, including but not limited to as a paid consultant to any entity (including any company or organization) or individual. Medical Experts should ensure that any conflict or potential conflict of interest does not affect or appear to affect his or her contributions of Content to the HealthTap. Medical Experts may receive compensation for Private Conversations on or through HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 医疗专家不得将内容发布到HealthTap的公共区域，以换取任何形式的赔偿，包括但不限于作为任何实体（包括任何公司或组织）或个人的付费顾问。医学专家应该确保任何冲突或潜在的利益冲突都不影响或不能影响他/她在HealthTap咨询平台上所贡献的内容。通过在HealthTap的私人对话，医疗专家可以获得补偿。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap licenses our online and mobile platform to doctors who accept invitations to engage in Private Conversations between doctors and consumers.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap将我们的在线和移动平台授权给接受医生和消费者之间私人对话邀请的医生。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap provides an online tool for doctors to provide consumers with quality health and healthcare related information.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap为医生提供了一个在线工具，同时也为消费者提供高质量的与健康和医疗相关的信息。

trans-unit.source: You may upload appropriate content to HealthTap and rights in submissions to HealthTap are governed by the HealthTap Terms of Use. Information in your Virtual Practice and any submissions to a Public Area of HealthTap are not confidential. Outside of these, we ask that you keep confidential all information exchanged between us and all information exchanged between you and HealthTap members in Private Conversations. You agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations when you use HealthTap, including necessary privacy and HIPAA requirements.
trans-unit.target: 您可以将相应的内容上传到HealthTap，提交到HealthTap的权利受HealthTap使用条款的约束。您的在线咨询中的信息和HealthTap公共区域的任何提交信息将不会保密。除此之外，我们要求您保密我们之间交换的所有信息和您与HealthTap成员之间在私人对话中交换的所有信息。您同意在使用HealthTap时遵守所有适用的法律和法规，包括必要的隐私和HIPAA要求。

trans-unit.source: , a Delaware corporation, having its principal place of business at 270 University Ave., 2nd Floor, Palo Alto, CA 94301 or as otherwise indicated on the Contact section of the
trans-unit.target: 比如，一家特拉华州公司，主要营业地点在270 University Ave.，2nd Floor，Palo Alto，CA 94301，或以其他方式在个人资料中显示。

trans-unit.source: means all confidential and proprietary information, whether received orally, in writing, or by or through a product, that is designated as confidential or that reasonably should be understood to be confidential given the nature of the information and the circumstances of disclosure. Confidential Information includes the terms and conditions of this Agreement, Participant submissions, information, and data, the HealthTap Services, and HealthTap’s: technology and technical information, product designs, business and marketing plans, and business processes. Confidential Information excludes any information that: (i) is or becomes generally known to the public without breach of any obligation owed to HealthTap; (ii) was known to Subscriber prior to its disclosure by the HealthTap without breach of any obligation owed to the HealthTap; (iii) was independently developed by Subscriber without breach of any obligation owed to HealthTap; or (iv) is received from a third party without breach of any obligation owed to HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 不论是经口头，书面还是通过产品被指定为机密或根据信息的性质和披露的情况理应合理地保密的所有机密和专有信息。机密信息包括本协议，参与者提交，信息和数据，HealthTap的服务条款和条件：技术和技术信息，产品设计，业务和营销计划和业务流程。（i）是公众已知的或普遍知道的，而不违反对HealthTap的任何义务; （ii）在HealthTap披露之前已为订户所知，且不违反对HealthTap的任何义务; （iii）由订户独立开发，且不违反对HealthTap的任何义务; （iv）从第三方收到，而不违反对HealthTap的任何义务。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap grants to Subscriber a personal and nontransferable, nonexclusive, worldwide, and nonsublicenseable license, during the Term: (1) to access and use HealthTap in connection with Private Conversations with Participants for which Subscriber will charge a fee for each Private Conversation (as amended or updated from time to time, the "Conversation Fee") to be paid by Participant in advance of each Private Conversation and (2) to use the HealthTap’s Marks for the sole purpose of identifying and promoting the HealthTap Services (defined below). This license is subject to Subscriber’s compliance with the terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement. HealthTap may withdraw any approval of any use of the HealthTap Marks at any time in its discretion. Subscriber shall not make any express or implied statement or suggestion, or use the HealthTap Marks in any manner, that dilutes, tarnishes, degrades, disparages or otherwise reflects adversely on HealthTap or its business, products, services or the HealthTap Marks.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap在期限内向用户授予个人和不可转让，非独占性，全球性和不可分许可的权利：（1）在与参与者的私人对话中访问和使用HealthTap，将为每个开通私人对话的用户收取费用（不时修改或更新“对话费”），且每个私人对话的费用需要由参与者提前支付（2）使用HealthTap的标记，唯一的目的是识别和促进HealthTap服务（定义如下）。此许可证需遵守订阅者遵守本协议中规定的条款和条件。HealthTap可以随时自行决定撤回任何使用HealthTap标志的任何批准。订阅者不得以任何方式对HealthTap或其业务，产品，服务或HealthTap标志作出任何明示或暗示，或以任何方式对HealthTap标志进行玷污，降级，贬损等。

trans-unit.source: Participants can pay for Private Conversations, and HealthTap shall collect these Conversation Fees. Subscribers can also provide Participants with a promotional code, which allow for a Private Conversation without a Conversation Fee (when such promotional codes are used, Subscriber shall not receive any compensation for any such interaction). Conversation Fees collected from Participants will be distributed to Subscriber by check or money transfer (using a service such as PayPal) after both (i) the total of the Subscriber’s Conversation Fees exceeds $100 (each a "Payment Distribution") and (ii) Subscriber request, and such distribution to Subscriber shall be the total of all collected Conversation Fees minus the applicable License and Subscription Fees. Conversation Fees and License and Subscription Fees are subject to adjustment pursuant to HealthTap policies and procedures
trans-unit.target: 参与者可以支付私人对话，HealthTap应收取这些对话费。订阅者还可以向参与者提供促销代码，允许在没有对话费的情况下进行私人对话（当使用此类促销代码时，订阅者不会因任何此类交互而获得任何补偿）。当（i）订户的对话费用总额超过100美元（每个为“付款分配”）和（ii）订阅者的要求和所有收集的对话费减去适用的许可和订阅费用的总和时，向参与者所收取的对话费会分发给订阅者来确认费用（比如使用paypal等服务）对话费和许可费和订阅费可根据HealthTap政策和程序进行调整。

trans-unit.source: Subscriber shall make best efforts to respond promptly to all Private Conversation requests. Subscriber is responsible and liable for all activities that occur in each Private Conversation, and: (i) has sole responsibility for all information provided in a Private Conversation, including the quality, accuracy, reliability, specificity, legality and appropriateness of the information; (ii) shall conduct each Private Conversation in adherence with HealthTap’s policies and procedures and, each as updated and amended from time to time; (iii) Subscriber shall not provide individual treatment recommendations or diagnosis in any Private Conversation; and (iv) Subscriber shall comply with any disclosure or disclaimer requirements of HealthTap. HealthTap will store archives of each Private Conversation, information on Participants, and Subscriber for at least the required legal period after each Private Conversation.
trans-unit.target: 用户应尽最大努力迅速响应所有私人对话请求。订阅者应对每次私下交谈中发生的所有活动负责，并且：（i）对私人会话中提供的所有信息负全部责任，包括信息的质量，准确性，可靠性，特异性，合法性和适当性; （ii）按照HealthTap的政策和程序进行每个私人对话，并且不时更新和修改; （iii）认购人不得在任何私人会谈中提供个别治疗建议或诊断; （iv）认购人须遵守HealthTap的任何披露或免责声明规定。HealthTap将在每次私下交谈后存储每个私人对话的档案，参与者信息和订阅者至少所需的法定期限。

trans-unit.source: Subscriber represents and warrants that the biographical information set forth in the Profile is true, correct and complete, and, Subscriber agrees to update Subscriber’s Profile immediately upon any updates to the information contained therein. In the event of any breach of the provisions of this Article 4, HealthTap and/or any of its parents, subsidiaries and affiliated entities, in addition to any other remedies available to them for such breach, including the recovery of damages, shall be entitled to injunctive relief to change any information in the Profile.
trans-unit.target: 订户声明并保证，个人资料中提供的履历信息是真实，正确和完整的，并且用户同意在其中包含的信息更新后立即更新订户的资料。如果发生任何违反本第4条规定的情况，HealthTap和/或其任何主公司，子公司和附属实体，除了任何其他补救措施可用于这种违约，包括恢复损害赔偿，应有权利得到禁令救济改变任何信息在配置文件。

trans-unit.source: As set forth in Exhibit A, Subscriber shall pay to HealthTap a fee for each Private Conversation as consideration for the license and HealthTap Services described in this Agreement (collectively and as adjusted from time to time, the "License and Subscription Fees"), which amount may be adjusted from time to time. The License and Subscription Fees are immediately due and owning at the time Subscriber accepts a Private Conversation request. The License and Subscription Fees are subject to adjustment pursuant to HealthTap policies and procedures. HealthTap’s fees do not include, and Subscriber is responsible for paying, any direct or indirect local, state, federal or foreign taxes, levies, duties or similar governmental assessments of any nature associated with Subscriber’s activities.
trans-unit.target: 如附录A所示，用户应向HealthTap支付每个私人对话的费用，作为本协议中描述的许可和HealthTap服务的费用（统称为不时调整的“许可和认购费”）， 金额可以不时调整。许可和订阅费在订阅者接受私人对话请求时立即到帐。许可和订阅费用可根据HealthTap的政策和程序进行调整。HealthTap的费用不包括，并且订阅者负责支付任何与订阅者活动相关的任何性质的任何直接或间接的地方，州，联邦或外国税务，征费，关税或类似的政府评估。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap shall retain all right, title and interest in the HealthTap Intellectual Property and Proprietary Material. Subscriber hereby transfers and assigns and agrees to execute any documents required to transfer and assign to HealthTap all rights, title and interest in the HealthTap Intellectual Property and Proprietary Material and related protectable elements or derivative works.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap应保留HealthTap知识产权和专有材料的所有权利，所有权和利益。用户在此转让和转让并同意执行将HealthTap知识产权和专有材料以及相关的可保护元素或衍生作品的所有权利，所有权和利益转让和转让给其所需的任何文件。

trans-unit.source: As between HealthTap and Subscriber, HealthTap and/or Participant own all rights, title and interest in and to all content (including electronic data or information) submitted by any Participant to HealthTap in connection with a Private Conversation, and such submissions are considered Confidential Information under this Agreement and are subject to the HealthTap Terms of Use and Privacy Statement. Subscriber Content, including content uploaded to HealthTap, is subject to HealthTap’s Terms of Use and Privacy Statement. Subscriber agrees not to upload or transmit any Content that (i) infringes another’s rights, (ii) is confidential, (iii) contains offensive content (including hate-speech, obscenity, and pornography), or any material that could give rise to any civil or criminal liability under applicable law or regulations, or (iv) contains software viruses or any other computer code, files or programs designed to interrupt, destroy or limit the functionality of any computer software or HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap和订阅者之间，HealthTap和/或参与者拥有由任何参与者提交给HealthTap的与私人对话相关的所有内容（包括电子数据或信息）的所有权利，所有权和利益，这些提交被视为机密信息；根据本协议，并受HealthTap的使用条款和隐私声明的约束。订阅者内容（包括上传到HealthTap的内容）需遵守HealthTap的使用条款和隐私权声明。订阅者同意不会上传或传输（i）侵犯他人的权利，（ii）保密，（iii）包含攻击性内容（包括仇恨言论，淫秽内容和色情内容）或任何可能引起任何 民事或刑事责任，或（iv）包含设计用于中断，破坏或限制任何计算机软件或HealthTap的功能的软件病毒或任何其他计算机代码，文件或程序。

trans-unit.source: 7. Restrictions.

Confidential information disclosed by HealthTap to Subscriber shall not be disclosed or used by Subscriber for any purpose outside the scope of this Agreement, except with HealthTap’s prior written permission, and Subscriber shall protect the Confidential Information as it would its own.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap向订户披露的机密信息不得由于本协议范围之外的任何目的而被用户公开或使用，除非获得HealthTap的事先书面许可，用户则须保护机密信息。

trans-unit.source: Subscriber shall use HealthTap solely as contemplated by this Agreement and shall not: (i) license, sublicense, sell, resell, rent, lease, transfer, assign, distribute, time share or otherwise commercially exploit or make HealthTap available to any third party, except as otherwise contemplated by this Agreement; (ii) send duplicative or unsolicited messages in violation of applicable laws; (iii) send or store infringing, obscene, threatening, libelous, or otherwise unlawful or tortuous material, including material that is harmful to children or violates third party privacy rights; (iv) send or store Malicious Code on or through HealthTap; (v) interfere with or disrupt the integrity or performance of HealthTap or the data contained therein; or (vi) attempt to gain unauthorized access to HealthTap or its related systems or networks.
trans-unit.target: 用户应仅使用本协议来设想HealthTap，且不得：（i）除本协议另有规定外，向任何第三方提供许可，再许可，出售，转售，出租，租赁，转让，转让，分发，分时或以其他方式商业利用或提供HealthTap; （ii）发送违反适用法律的重复或非请求邮件; （iii）发送或存储侵犯，淫秽，威胁，诽谤或其他非法或曲折的材料，包括对儿童有害或违反第三方隐私权的材料; （iv）在HealthTap上或通过HealthTap发送或存储恶意代码; （v）干扰或破坏HealthTap或其中包含的数据的完整性或性能; （vi）尝试未经授权访问HealthTap或其相关系统或网络。

trans-unit.source: Without the prior consent of HealthTap, during the Term of this Agreement and for a period of one (1) year following the termination of this Agreement, Subscriber shall not, directly or indirectly: (A) for Subscriber or on behalf or in conjunction with others, develop or serve as the primary owner of any business which is in competition with HealthTap or (B) enter into any other agreement or other arrangement (written or oral) with a party other than HealthTap or its affiliates to license services or provide Private Conversations similar to those described in this Agreement; provided, however, these restrictions shall not prohibit Subscriber from practicing medicine or performing services for Subscriber’s employer or otherwise that are disclosed in writing to HealthTap prior to the Effective Date.
trans-unit.target: 未经HealthTap事先授权同意，在本协议期限内以及本协议终止后一（1）年内，用户不得直接或间接：（A）为订户或代表他人或与他人一起，发展或作为与HealthTap竞争的业务的主要所有者，（B）与一方订立任何其他协议或其他安排（书面或口头），除了HealthTap或其附属公司的许可服务或提供类似于本协议中所述的私人对话; 但是，这些限制不得禁止用户在生效日期之前向HealthTap以书面形式向执行医生或为认购人的雇主执行服务。

trans-unit.source: In the event of an actual or threatened breach of the provisions of this Article 6, HealthTap and affiliated entities, in addition to any other remedies available to them shall be entitled to injunctive relief restraining Subscriber from such conduct.
trans-unit.target: 在实际或可能违反本第6条规定的情况下，HealthTap和附属实体除了可以获得的任何其他补救措施外，还有权限制禁止令用户免除此类行为。

trans-unit.source: This Agreement commences on the Effective Date and continues for a period of days until the first day of the following month the Effective Date ("
trans-unit.target: 本协议在生效日期开始，并持续一段时间，直到下一个月的第一天为生效日期。

trans-unit.source: A. Term.
trans-unit.target: A 条款。

trans-unit.source: Either party may terminate this Agreement without cause upon thirty (30) days written notice; upon such termination by Subscriber, Subscriber agrees not to participate in any further Private Conversations on HealthTap and any such participation shall reinstate this agreement; upon such termination by HealthTap, Subscriber agrees not to participate in any further Private Conversations on HealthTap. This Agreement may be terminated with cause (i) upon thirty (30) days written notice by non-breaching party of a material breach to the breaching party if such breach remains uncured at the expiration of such period; (ii) immediately, if a party becomes the subject of a petition in bankruptcy or any other proceeding relating to insolvency, receivership, liquidation or assignment for the benefit of creditors, (iii) immediately, upon notice by HealthTap upon a breach of any of Sections 3, 4 or 7(D).
trans-unit.target: 任何一方均可在三十（30）天书面通知后立即终止本协议; 在订户终止后，订户同意不再参与HealthTap上的任何进一步私人对话，任何此类参与都将恢复本协议; 在HealthTap终止后，用户同意不再参加HealthTap上的任何进一步私人对话。本协议可能因以下原因被终止：（i）如果违约行为在违约行为期限届满时仍未得到解决，则违约方在三十（30）天内书面通知重大违约行为; （ii）如果一方成为破产申请或与破产，接管，清算或转让有关的债权人的任何其他诉讼的主体，（iii）在HealthTap违反任何第3，4或7（D）条。

trans-unit.source: B. Termination.
trans-unit.target: B. 终止。

trans-unit.source: 10. Legal Compliance.
11. No Warranties, Mutual Indemnification and Limitations of Liability.

EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY PROVIDED HEREIN, NEITHER PARTY MAKES ANY WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS, IMPLIED, STATUTORY OR OTHERWISE, AND SPECIFICALLY DISCLAIMS ALL IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING ANY WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW.
trans-unit.target: 除非本协议中明确规定，否则任何一方不得以明示，暗示，法定或其他方式提供任何保证，并且在适用的最大范围内，明确拒绝所有默示保证，包括适销性或适用于特定用途的任何担保法。

trans-unit.source: IN NO EVENT SHALL HEALTHTAP’S AGGREGATE LIABILITY ARISING OUT OF OR RELATED TO THIS AGREEMENT, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, TORT OR UNDER ANY OTHER THEORY OF LIABILITY, EXCEED THE LESSER OF $100 OR THE AMOUNTS ACTUALLY PAID BY AND DUE FROM SUBSCRIBER HEREUNDER IN THE ONE MONTH PRECEDING THE INCIDENT GIVING RISE TO LIABILITY. IN NO EVENT SHALL EITHER PARTY HAVE ANY LIABILITY TO THE OTHER PARTY FOR ANY LOST PROFITS OR FOR ANY INDIRECT, SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL, PUNITIVE, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES HOWEVER CAUSED AND, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, TORT OR UNDER ANY OTHER THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER OR NOT THE PARTY HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES.
trans-unit.target: 在任何情况下，HEALTHTAP对由本协议产生或与本协议相关的合同不负责任，无论是在合同，侵权或任何其他责任理论中，超过100美元的损失，或者在一个月前由此处的订阅者实际支付的金额引起责任的偶发事件。在任何情况下，任何一方对于任何利润损失或任何间接，特殊，偶发，惩罚性或间接损害，无论是否合同，侵权或任何其他责任理论，均不对其他方承担任何责任，无论是否非缔约方已被告知此类损害的可能性。

trans-unit.source: 12. General Provisions.

Each party represents and warrants that it has the legal power to enter into this Agreement. This Agreement does not create a partnership, joint venture, agency, fiduciary or employment relationship between the parties. This Agreement is the entire agreement between Subject and HealthTap relating to its subject matter, and replaces any prior agreements concerning its subject matter. If there is any conflict between this agreement and a mutually signed written agreement between HealthTap and Subscriber related to HealthTap, the signed written agreement will control. If HealthTap provides a translation of the English language version of this agreement, the English language version of this agreement will control if there is any conflict. If HealthTap chooses not to enforce any provision of this Agreement, HealthTap retains the right to enforce it in the future. This means that the failure to enforce any provision of this Agreement does not constitute a waiver of that provision. If any provision in this Agreement is found to be unenforceable, it and any related provisions will be interpreted to best accomplish the essential purpose of any unenforceable provision. Neither party may assign any of its rights or obligations hereunder without the prior written consent of the other party (not to be unreasonably withheld); provided, however, HealthTap may assign this Agreement without consent of Subscriber, in connection with a merger, acquisition, corporate reorganization, or sale of all or substantially all of its assets. Any attempt by a party to assign its rights or obligations under this Agreement in breach of this section shall be void. Subject to the foregoing, this Agreement shall bind and inure to the benefit successors and permitted assigns. This agreement is governed by California law, excluding California's choice-of-law rules. THE EXCLUSIVE VENUE FOR ANY DISPUTE RELATING TO THIS AGREEMENT IS SANTA CLARA COUNTY, CALIFORNIA. YOU AND US CONSENT TO THE PERSONAL JURISDICTION OF THESE COURTS. Nothing in this agreement limits either party's ability to seek equitable relief. All notices under this Agreement shall be in writing and shall be deemed to have been given upon: (i) personal delivery; (ii) the second business day after mailing; (iii) the second business day after sending by confirmed facsimile; or (iv) if by HealthTap to Subscriber, the second business day after sending by email. Notices shall be directed to the party’s current known address, and if by email to HealthTap, to: notice@healthtap.com.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着未能执行本协议的任何条款不构成对该条款的放弃。本协议受加州法律控制，不包括加利福尼亚的法律选择规则。与本协议有关的任何争议的独家场地是加利福尼亚州圣克拉拉县。您和我们同意这些法院的个人司法管辖权。本协议中没有任何规定限制任何一方寻求平等救济的能力。

trans-unit.source: Questions and answers on HealthTap are for general education and information. Only general, informational questions are permitted. For specific, personal health questions, always ask your own doctor or healthcare provider. (HealthTap Medical Experts are not your personal doctor or healthcare provider, and their answers to questions are not personal or for personal use.)

trans-unit.source: . If we are unable to remove this information for any reason, we will let you know that we are unable to do so and why. You can control what is visible in your Public Profile through your Account Settings.

Aggregated information is information from multiple users that is not associated with any individual user account, statistics are summaries of information, not associated with any individual user account, and de-identified data does not include Personally Identifiable Information, such as first and last names or e-mail addresses. Aggregated information and de-identified data and statistics are used to run our service. We may use aggregated information or de-identified data gathered from HealthTap and related statistics to improve the services provided through HealthTap, and for research and analysis. We may also provide this information to our partners for such purposes.
trans-unit.target: 聚集的信息和去可识别性的数据和统计被用来经营我们的服务。我们会使用从HealthTap收集的聚合信息或去可识别性数据以及相关统计来改善服务，增进研究和分析。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap offers information to support the health decisions that you decide to make, in connection with the medical advice and guidance you receive from your doctor. The choices you make are yours. HealthTap does not provide medical advice, is not a doctor, and the information on HealthTap should not be used to delay or replace professional medical treatment. HealthTap does not make recommendations or endorsements. Please see our

trans-unit.source: . More information about our security measures is located on our

The security of your personal information is a top priority for us. We are committed to protecting the security of your personal information. Experts design our security measures, and we use a variety of technologies and procedures to help protect the security of your personal information from unauthorized access, use, and disclosure. For example, information transferred between you and the site is encrypted. We restrict access to personal information to HealthTap employees, contractors, and agents who need to know that information in order to operate, develop, or improve our services. These individuals are bound by confidentiality obligations and may be subject to discipline, including termination and criminal prosecution, if they fail to meet these obligations. No method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure, however. Therefore, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. If you have any specific questions about security on our Site, please see our
trans-unit.target: 我们严格限制需要了解个人信息以运营、开发或改进我们的服务的HealthTap的员工、承包商和代理商获取这些信息。这些个人受保密义务的约束，如果他们没有尽到这些义务将会受到包括终止业务和犯罪起诉在内的法律的制约。然而没有一种网络传输或电子储存的方法是100%安全的。

trans-unit.source: Currently, we only let you provide us with information about you (except in the case of a Caregiver providing information about a Care Recipient). This Privacy Statement applies to this information. In the future, we may allow users to provide us with information by or through other separately operated products or services.
trans-unit.target: 目前我们仅让您提供关于您的信息（除非护理者提供护理接受者信息的情况）。

trans-unit.source: . We cannot provide legal advice.

This Privacy Statement does not apply to other service providers or links to other sites that are not owned or controlled by HealthTap, and you should read the individual privacy polices and terms of service of these providers before using their services. We encourage you to contact us if you believe a provider is not protecting the privacy or security of your health and wellness information. You may contact us in writing at:
trans-unit.target: 如果您认为一名服务提供者没有保护您的健康信息的隐私和安全，请您联系我们。

trans-unit.source: Some users may want to share personal information with a Service Provider. You can always do this on your own. If we allow this in the future, before you share any information with a Service Provider through HealthTap, we will require you to confirm that you agree to any such sharing.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们在未来允许这项行动，我们会在您通过HealthTap与服务提供商分享任何信息之前要求您确认您同意这些分享行为。

trans-unit.source: We are committed to protecting the privacy of children. This Site is not intended or designed for children under the age of 13. We do not collect Personally Identifiable Information from any person we actually know is a child under the age of 13. A Caregiver may use this site for a Care Recipient who is under the age of 13, but the Care Recipient may not enter any Personally Identifiable Information into the site – all such information must be entered by the Caregiver.
trans-unit.target: 我们致力于保护儿童的隐私。我们不收集获知的年龄低于13岁的儿童的个人身份可识别信息。我们不会收集任何13岁以下儿童的个人身份信息。

trans-unit.source: An Introductory Consult is a "meet and greet" for customers who are not yet your patients. Please provide only advice in these sessions. At your discretion, and as appropriate under applicable medical standards (including following an in-person visit where required), you may accept them as a patients. With patients, you may provide treatment, write prescriptions, or suggest checklists. Patients will also be able to make additional appointments with you through your Virtual Practice.

trans-unit.resname: GUIDELINES To ask a great HealthTap question, use these helpful guidelines
trans-unit.source: GUIDELINES To ask a great HealthTap question, use these helpful guidelines
trans-unit.target: 指南 要提出一个优秀的HealthTap问题，请使用这些有帮助的指南

trans-unit.resname:
Sweat the details... at least a little. Hide examples
Good: I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks. What could be the causes?
Not so good: Why do I have a rash?
trans-unit.source:
Sweat the details... at least a little. Hide examples
Good: I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks. What could be the causes?
Not so good: Why do I have a rash?

trans-unit.resname:
Make it long enough to be helpful to others. Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers. Show examples
Good: What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
Not so good: Why back pain?
trans-unit.source:
Make it long enough to be helpful to others. Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers. Show examples
Good: What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
Not so good: Why back pain?

trans-unit.resname:
Include sex/gender, when relevant. Show examples
Sex/Gender helpful: What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast.
Sex/Gender not necessary: What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?
trans-unit.source:
Include sex/gender, when relevant. Show examples
Sex/Gender helpful: What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast.
Sex/Gender not necessary: What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?

trans-unit.resname:
Include an approximate age. Show examples
Different ages will lead to different answers: For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts. What are some things that could cause this?
Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?
trans-unit.source:
Include an approximate age. Show examples
Different ages will lead to different answers: For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts. What are some things that could cause this?
Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?

trans-unit.resname:
Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant. Show examples
Good: My son is 3 years old, weights 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall. Is his size OK for his age?
Not so good: My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34. Is he OK for his age?
trans-unit.source:
Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant. Show examples
Good: My son is 3 years old, weights 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall. Is his size OK for his age?
Not so good: My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34. Is he OK for his age?

trans-unit.resname:
Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication. Show examples
Good: My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
Not so good: My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever. Tried Tylenol but fever persists. Take more Tylenol?
trans-unit.source:
Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication. Show examples
Good: My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
Not so good: My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever. Tried Tylenol but fever persists. Take more Tylenol?

trans-unit.resname:
Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for a YES or NO answer. Show examples
Good: How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
Not so good: Do antibiotics work in children?
trans-unit.source:
Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for a YES or NO answer. Show examples
Good: How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
Not so good: Do antibiotics work in children?

trans-unit.resname:
Try to leave opinions out. Show examples
Good: Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
Not so good: Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?
trans-unit.source:
Try to leave opinions out. Show examples
Good: Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
Not so good: Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?

trans-unit.resname:
The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang. Show examples
Good: I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps. Could I have torn a muscle?
Not so good: Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?
trans-unit.source:
The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang. Show examples
Good: I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps. Could I have torn a muscle?
Not so good: Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?

trans-unit.resname:
Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions. Show examples
Good: My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear. Is this common?
Not so good: And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?
trans-unit.source:
Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions. Show examples
Good: My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear. Is this common?
Not so good: And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?

trans-unit.resname:
To maintain privacy, leave your name and the names of others out (unless that “other” is a celebrity who has publicly talked about an issue). Show examples
Good: I just heard the actor Michael J. Fox talk about his Parkinson’s disease. Are there any new, good treatments that have come out in the last 3 years?
Not so good: Hello doctor. My name is John Doe, and I am wondering if there are any good treatments for Parkinson’s disease.
trans-unit.source:
To maintain privacy, leave your name and the names of others out (unless that “other” is a celebrity who has publicly talked about an issue). Show examples
Good: I just heard the actor Michael J. Fox talk about his Parkinson’s disease. Are there any new, good treatments that have come out in the last 3 years?
Not so good: Hello doctor. My name is John Doe, and I am wondering if there are any good treatments for Parkinson’s disease.

trans-unit.resname:
Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing. Show examples
Good: How do you know if you are pregnant, if you never have regular periods?
Not so good: How do u no ur prego if u never have reg periods?
trans-unit.source:
Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing. Show examples
Good: How do you know if you are pregnant, if you never have regular periods?
Not so good: How do u no ur prego if u never have reg periods?

trans-unit.resname:
Ask in English. This is the language commonly used by doctors on HealthTap. Show examples
Good: I pruned some trees last weekend and my arm has been hurting for 2 days. Could this be the cause?
Not so good: Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?
trans-unit.source:
Ask in English. This is the language commonly used by doctors on HealthTap. Show examples
Good: I pruned some trees last weekend and my arm has been hurting for 2 days. Could this be the cause?
Not so good: Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?

trans-unit.resname:
These terms (the “Free Trial Terms”) govern the offer (the “Prime Free Trial Offer”) by HealthTap to New Qualified Users to access to the HealthTap Prime Service upon signing up and submitting payment information for a new HealthTap Prime account (the “Free Trial Period”). By submitting your payment details, you accept the Prime Free-Trial Offer and: (i) consent to our use of your payment information in accordance with our Payment Details Terms, and (ii) acknowledge and agree to the HealthTap Terms of Use and these Free Trial Terms. If you decide that you do not want to become a paying user of HealthTap Prime under the standard HealthTap Prime Terms in effect at the end of the Free Trial Period, you must cancel your HealthTap Prime Subscription (in the Billing Settings section of your HealthTap account Settings) before the end of the Free Trial Period. Subscription fees are not prorated; cancellations after the termination of the Free Trial Period will remain active through the end of the trial length period during which the account is canceled. You may only use this Free Trial Offer once. HealthTap reserves the right, in its absolute discretion, to determine individual eligibility for this Prime Free-Trial Offer and to withdraw or to modify this Prime Trial Offer and/or the Free Trial Terms at any time, without prior notice and with no liability.

Payment Details Terms: When you sign up for a trial or any of our Premium Services, or make other purchases through the Apps, your credit card information and other financial data needed to process your payment are collected and stored by third party payment processors, and we may collect some limited information, such as your postal code and transaction history details. The use of your data by any such third party payment processors is subject to their privacy policies. These third parties generally provide us with some limited information (such as a unique token that enables you to make additional purchases using the information they’ve stored, and your card’s type, expiration date, and last four digits).

See the HealthTap Terms of Use for the definitions of “HealthTap,” “HealthTap Prime,” “Apps,” and “Premium Services.” “New Qualified Users” means new HealthTap Prime customers without a prior primary or sub-account or trial account on HealthTap Prime.

Please note that the following prescriptions are not currently available via HealthTap Prime: narcotics or DEA controlled substances (Schedule I, II, III, IV), psychiatric or lifestyle medications (such as diet or erectile dysfunction drugs), or medications restricted by individual states.
trans-unit.source:

Doctors can provide care and recommend and prescribe appropriate treatments. New treatment prescriptions and refills (both excluding controlled drugs), which can be sent to your local pharmacy, are available where medically indicated and deemed appropriate by the treating doctor based on your Virtual Consult.

Enjoy the convenience of having prescription treatments sent to your local pharmacy, whether you're at home or on vacation. Learn more ›

trans-unit.resname:
RateRx is a new, independent resource for doctors and patients alike, that presents ratings of medication effectiveness as reported by thousands of U.S.-licensed doctors in clinical practice of more than 137 specialties. RateRx represents the first comprehensive assessment of what experienced clinicians in each specialty actually use in the care of patients with specific conditions. Unlike other studies, which may report on the clinical effectiveness of treatments under controlled circumstances, RateRx calls on the deep, long-term, real-world experience of top doctors to reveal which treatments doctors have learned actually work with patients.

Doctors were asked to rate the clinical effectiveness of a drug for treating a condition on a scale of 1 to 5 stars. Contributing doctors gave ratings to medications for their use with specific indications based on their knowledge and were instructed to provide input based only on clinical experience using the drug for that indication. We summarized the combined ratings for each treatment into an aggregate rating reflecting doctors’ collective experiences. The profiles of all doctors who provided ratings are visible to users, who can review details of the doctors’ training and experiences, including their specialties and board certifications.

Participation in this study was open to all U.S.-licensed doctors in good standing. All 66,000 doctors in HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network were encouraged to participate. In addition, HealthTap invited more than 500,000 U.S. licensed doctors in our extended network to participate. Doctors are able to enter effectiveness ratings for medications that treat any condition, and can enter and add ratings for any new medication treatments not already included.

RateRx results display each treatment for an indication in an ordered rank based on average ratings, from highest rated to lowest. When differences between the ratings of alternative treatments are deemed meaningful based on the amount of data presented.

To ensure unbiased doctor evaluations, doctors do not see their colleagues’ existing contributions until after they have entered their own rating. Recommendations cannot be changed once submitted, but after ratings are submitted, doctors can view the ratings of other doctors and comment on these. Both patients and doctors can learn from the RateRx ratings system. Patients benefit from the collective wisdom shared by these doctors, enabling them to see how different treatments for the same conditions are rated and reviewed. Doctors benefit from their colleagues’ ratings and comments, and are able to interpret them by referring to the contributing doctors’ practice profiles (which show their education and experience, their specialty training, years in practice, DocScore, and their “Known for” topics).

Comments, which are optional, are often used by doctors to qualify or explain ratings, or to share details of how medications are used for each indication. Comments are available to read and review, do not change the numeric value of the rating. Ratings are based on generic drug names, but brand names are presented to permit doctors to rate specific drugs. Brand names are shown for every generic medication name presented. This study does not differentiate ratings between different brand names for the same medication. The most common medication treatments for each condition are listed for ratings, but doctors are encouraged to add treatments for any indication, ensuring the inclusion of new or novel treatments for each condition. Doctors were instructed to add medications not previously on the list of standard treatment only if they had experience using the medication to treat the condition at issue and found these medication effective in the treatment of that condition.

Okay
trans-unit.source:
RateRx is a new, independent resource for doctors and patients alike, that presents ratings of medication effectiveness as reported by thousands of U.S.-licensed doctors in clinical practice of more than 137 specialties. RateRx represents the first comprehensive assessment of what experienced clinicians in each specialty actually use in the care of patients with specific conditions. Unlike other studies, which may report on the clinical effectiveness of treatments under controlled circumstances, RateRx calls on the deep, long-term, real-world experience of top doctors to reveal which treatments doctors have learned actually work with patients.

Doctors were asked to rate the clinical effectiveness of a drug for treating a condition on a scale of 1 to 5 stars. Contributing doctors gave ratings to medications for their use with specific indications based on their knowledge and were instructed to provide input based only on clinical experience using the drug for that indication. We summarized the combined ratings for each treatment into an aggregate rating reflecting doctors’ collective experiences. The profiles of all doctors who provided ratings are visible to users, who can review details of the doctors’ training and experiences, including their specialties and board certifications.

Participation in this study was open to all U.S.-licensed doctors in good standing. All 66,000 doctors in HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network were encouraged to participate. In addition, HealthTap invited more than 500,000 U.S. licensed doctors in our extended network to participate. Doctors are able to enter effectiveness ratings for medications that treat any condition, and can enter and add ratings for any new medication treatments not already included.

RateRx results display each treatment for an indication in an ordered rank based on average ratings, from highest rated to lowest. When differences between the ratings of alternative treatments are deemed meaningful based on the amount of data presented.

To ensure unbiased doctor evaluations, doctors do not see their colleagues’ existing contributions until after they have entered their own rating. Recommendations cannot be changed once submitted, but after ratings are submitted, doctors can view the ratings of other doctors and comment on these. Both patients and doctors can learn from the RateRx ratings system. Patients benefit from the collective wisdom shared by these doctors, enabling them to see how different treatments for the same conditions are rated and reviewed. Doctors benefit from their colleagues’ ratings and comments, and are able to interpret them by referring to the contributing doctors’ practice profiles (which show their education and experience, their specialty training, years in practice, DocScore, and their “Known for” topics).

Comments, which are optional, are often used by doctors to qualify or explain ratings, or to share details of how medications are used for each indication. Comments are available to read and review, do not change the numeric value of the rating. Ratings are based on generic drug names, but brand names are presented to permit doctors to rate specific drugs. Brand names are shown for every generic medication name presented. This study does not differentiate ratings between different brand names for the same medication. The most common medication treatments for each condition are listed for ratings, but doctors are encouraged to add treatments for any indication, ensuring the inclusion of new or novel treatments for each condition. Doctors were instructed to add medications not previously on the list of standard treatment only if they had experience using the medication to treat the condition at issue and found these medication effective in the treatment of that condition.

Okay
trans-unit.target:
RateRx代表了第一个针对有经验的医生在他们各自的专业领域所使用的治疗特定情况病人的手段的全面性评估。与其他研究在特定的情况下评价治疗有效性不同的是，RateRx希望获得顶级医生深入而长期的实际经验来获取最佳治疗方法。推荐一旦被提交就无法更改，但是在提交打分之后，医生可以查看其它医生的评分并进行评论。患者可以从这种医生集体智慧中受益，让他们能够看到对相同症状的不同治疗方式是如何被评分与评价的。打分是基于药品的通用名称的，但是也会显示品牌名称，准许医生对特定的药品进行评分。该调查不会区分不同品牌的药物对同一种药物治疗方式的评分。

好

trans-unit.resname: When you accept a consult, your patient will have the choice of interacting with you via video, voice, or text chat. It’s important to start each consult with a smile. Do whatever you can to make the patient feel comfortable. Practice now by typing a caring chat message below and pressing enter to send.
trans-unit.source: When you accept a consult, your patient will have the choice of interacting with you via video, voice, or text chat. It’s important to start each consult with a smile. Do whatever you can to make the patient feel comfortable. Practice now by typing a caring chat message below and pressing enter to send.
trans-unit.target: 当您接受咨询，您的患者将有机会选择通过视频，语音或文字聊天与您互动。用一个微笑开始每次咨询是非常重要的。做任何可以让患者感到舒适的事。现在实践在下面输入关心的聊天消息，然后按Enter键发送。

trans-unit.resname: All consults will start with a chat message from the patient explaining the reason for the consult.
trans-unit.source: All consults will start with a chat message from the patient explaining the reason for the consult.
trans-unit.target: 所有咨询将从患者的聊天消息开始解释咨询的原因。

trans-unit.resname: I have a skin rash and I’m concerned it might be from food allergies.
trans-unit.source: I have a skin rash and I’m concerned it might be from food allergies.
trans-unit.target: 我有皮疹，我担心它可能是因为食物过敏。

trans-unit.resname: One of the exciting things about virtual consults is that patients can share photos, test results, or other documents with you.
trans-unit.source: One of the exciting things about virtual consults is that patients can share photos, test results, or other documents with you.
trans-unit.target: 关于在线咨询的一个令人兴奋的事情是患者可以和你一起<b>共享照片，测试结果或其他文档</ b>。

trans-unit.resname: In addition to text consults, patients can choose to have video consults. Next we will check if your video is working correctly.
trans-unit.source: In addition to text consults, patients can choose to have video consults. Next we will check if your video is working correctly.
trans-unit.target: 除了文字咨询，病人可以选择视频咨询。接下来，我们将检查您的视频是否正常工作。

trans-unit.resname: Great! The Patient Chart will be very helpful to you, as you can see your patient’s medical history, read questions the patient has asked, and review consult notes from other HealthTap doctors.
trans-unit.source: Great! The Patient Chart will be very helpful to you, as you can see your patient’s medical history, read questions the patient has asked, and review consult notes from other HealthTap doctors.
trans-unit.target: 太棒了！<b>患者图表</ b>会对您非常有帮助，因为您可以看到您患者的病史，阅读患者（已询问）的问题并查看其他HealthTap医生的咨询笔记。

trans-unit.resname: Click on the different sections below to explore the patient chart. When ready, press the continue button.
trans-unit.source: Click on the different sections below to explore the patient chart. When ready, press the continue button.
trans-unit.target: 单击下面的不同部分以浏览患者图表。准备就绪后，按继续按钮。

trans-unit.resname: Tip: Always explain to the patient when you divert your eyes from the camera to read or type notes. Make them feel comfortable by explaining that this is normal and expected.
trans-unit.source: Tip: Always explain to the patient when you divert your eyes from the camera to read or type notes. Make them feel comfortable by explaining that this is normal and expected.
trans-unit.target: 小贴士：记得总是向患者解释，当您把眼睛从相机移开来读取或输入笔记。让他们感到舒适通过解释这是正常的和预期的。

trans-unit.resname: Intro consults are a first visit with a prospective patient who is not yet accepted into your practice. Even if you choose not to accept a patient into your practice, you can still offer advice and suggest appropriate follow-up care during the intro consult.
trans-unit.source: Intro consults are a first visit with a prospective patient who is not yet accepted into your practice. Even if you choose not to accept a patient into your practice, you can still offer advice and suggest appropriate follow-up care during the intro consult.
trans-unit.target: <b>咨询介绍</ b>是对未来患者的首次访问那些还没有被接受过您实践的人。即使您选择不接受患者进行您的实践，您仍然可以提供咨询并在介绍性咨询期间建议适当的后续护理。

trans-unit.resname: Enter Introductory Consult Notes for the patient. When done, press the continue button.
trans-unit.source: Enter Introductory Consult Notes for the patient. When done, press the continue button.
trans-unit.target: 为患者输入介绍性咨询注意事项。准备就绪后，按继续按钮。

trans-unit.resname: At any time during the intro consult, you may select the checkmark below the intro consult notes section to accept the patient into your virtual practice. This is a great way to extend your reach and grow your practice!
trans-unit.source: At any time during the intro consult, you may select the checkmark below the intro consult notes section to accept the patient into your virtual practice. This is a great way to extend your reach and grow your practice!
trans-unit.target: 在介绍咨询期间的任何时间，您可以选择复选标记以下介绍咨询注意事项部分<b>接受患者</ b> 进入您的在线咨询。这是一个很好的方式来扩展您的范围和增长您的实践经验！

trans-unit.resname: When you accept a person as a patient, the full SOAP Note displays. To complete your consult, you'll need to complete and submit your summary or SOAP Note. To help you fully understand this form, let's take a tour through each of the sections.
trans-unit.source: When you accept a person as a patient, the full SOAP Note displays. To complete your consult, you'll need to complete and submit your summary or SOAP Note. To help you fully understand this form, let's take a tour through each of the sections.
trans-unit.target: 当您接受某人作为患者时，完整的<b> SOAP </ b>注意显示。要完成您的咨询，您需要完成并提交摘要或SOAP注释。为了帮助您完全理解这种形式，让我们观察每个部分和细节。

trans-unit.resname: When you accept a person as a patient, the full SOAP Note displays. To complete your consult and get paid for the visit, you'll need to complete and submit your summary or SOAP Note. To help you fully understand this form, let's take a tour through each of the sections.
trans-unit.source: When you accept a person as a patient, the full SOAP Note displays. To complete your consult and get paid for the visit, you'll need to complete and submit your summary or SOAP Note. To help you fully understand this form, let's take a tour through each of the sections.
trans-unit.target: 当您接受某人作为患者时，完整的<b> SOAP </ b>注意显示。要完成您的咨询，并得到访问的报酬，您需要完成并提交摘要或SOAP注释。为了帮助您完全理解这种形式，让我们观察每个部分和细节。

trans-unit.resname: Keep it up! You are more than half way done. Subjective, Objective, and Assessment sections are where you can enter text freely about the visit.
trans-unit.source: Keep it up! You are more than half way done. Subjective, Objective, and Assessment sections are where you can enter text freely about the visit.
trans-unit.target: 继续努力！您是一半以上了。<b>主观，客观， 和评估</ b>的部分，您可以在其中自由输入文字访问。

trans-unit.resname: The Plan section has several structured elements to help your patient follow through with your recommendations.
trans-unit.source: The Plan section has several structured elements to help your patient follow through with your recommendations.
trans-unit.target: <b>计划</ b>部分有几个结构化元素，可帮助您的患者遵循您的建议。

trans-unit.resname: This is where you can really help your patient! You’ll notice that you can add as many recommended actionable steps or follow-up care instructions. Make sure you have at least one. You can also turn any recommendation into a helpful regular reminder with just a few clicks.
trans-unit.source: This is where you can really help your patient! You’ll notice that you can add as many recommended actionable steps or follow-up care instructions. Make sure you have at least one. You can also turn any recommendation into a helpful regular reminder with just a few clicks.
trans-unit.target: 这是您真正可以帮助您的患者的地方！您会注意到您可以添加任意数量的<b>建议的可操作步骤</ b>或跟进的照顾说明。<b>请确保您至少有一个。</ b>您可以将任何建议变成有用的常规提醒那些提醒只需几次点击。

trans-unit.resname: Go ahead and give it a try. For example, recommend a 30-minute walk, once a day, for a month.
trans-unit.source: Go ahead and give it a try. For example, recommend a 30-minute walk, once a day, for a month.
trans-unit.target: 去吧，试试看。例如，建议步行30分钟，一个月中每天一次。

trans-unit.resname: One of the things patients really appreciate is that you can prescribe medications that are sent directly to a patient's indicated pharmacy. For patients located outside of the U.S, you can recommend medications.
trans-unit.source: One of the things patients really appreciate is that you can prescribe medications that are sent directly to a patient's indicated pharmacy. For patients located outside of the U.S, you can recommend medications.
trans-unit.target: 患者真正感谢的一个事情是，您可以开<b> 药方</ b>，并将其直接发送到患者指定的药房。对于位于美国以外的患者，您可以推荐药物。

trans-unit.resname: Another new functionality, that delights and saves patients time is the ability for you to order lab tests virtually. The lab order will be sent to the Quest Service Center the patient chooses. Once the patient has been tested you will be sent the results for review.
trans-unit.source: Another new functionality, that delights and saves patients time is the ability for you to order lab tests virtually. The lab order will be sent to the Quest Service Center the patient chooses. Once the patient has been tested you will be sent the results for review.
trans-unit.target: 另一个节省患者时间的新功能是您可以网上预定实验室检测。实验室订单将发送到患者选择的Quest服务中心。一旦患者已经测试，您将收到结果进行审查。

trans-unit.resname: Simply start typing to see the options of more than 2,000 lab tests you can order.
trans-unit.source: Simply start typing to see the options of more than 2,000 lab tests you can order.
trans-unit.target: 只需开始输入，便可查看超过2000个您可以预定的实验室检测。

trans-unit.resname: To suggest a follow-up appointment, include when the patient should schedule the appointment and, optionally, what the purpose of the follow-up is. The patient will receive a link to easily schedule the appointment.
trans-unit.source: To suggest a follow-up appointment, include when the patient should schedule the appointment and, optionally, what the purpose of the follow-up is. The patient will receive a link to easily schedule the appointment.
trans-unit.target: 建议后续预约，包括当患者何时应该安排预约，并且可选地规定后续活动的目的。患者将收到一个链接，以方便安排预约。

trans-unit.resname: You can refer your patients to any doctor within or outside the HealthTap network. Alternatively, refer a specialty and we’ll provide a list of specialists for your patient to choose from.
trans-unit.source: You can refer your patients to any doctor within or outside the HealthTap network. Alternatively, refer a specialty and we’ll provide a list of specialists for your patient to choose from.
trans-unit.target: 您可以<b>将您的患者</ b>转诊至任何医生不论他是否在HealthTap网络内。或者，参考专业，我们会提供您的患者可供选择的专家列表。

trans-unit.resname: Tip: We recommend you refer patients to doctors who participate in HealthTap Concierge so your patients can get immediate follow-up care. Concierge doctors will be indicated with a small green dot and labeled "Available for Virtual Consults".
trans-unit.source: Tip: We recommend you refer patients to doctors who participate in HealthTap Concierge so your patients can get immediate follow-up care. Concierge doctors will be indicated with a small green dot and labeled "Available for Virtual Consults".
trans-unit.target: 小贴士：我们建议您将患者转诊参加HealthTap Concierge，让您的患者可以立即接受后续护理。特邀医生将显示一个小绿点，表示为“可用于在线服务”。

trans-unit.resname: Checklists are recommended actions that help your patient achieve a health goal or feel better. Patients receive timely reminders for each to-do on the list. You can browse through a wealth of checklists that doctors on HealthTap have created by topic and choose the best one for your patient.
trans-unit.source: Checklists are recommended actions that help your patient achieve a health goal or feel better. Patients receive timely reminders for each to-do on the list. You can browse through a wealth of checklists that doctors on HealthTap have created by topic and choose the best one for your patient.
trans-unit.target: <b>检查清单</ b>是可帮助您的患者实现“ 健康目标或让患者感觉更好。患者接受及时的提醒，待办事项列表。您可以浏览大量HealthTap上的医生已经创建了主题的清单， 并选择一个对您的患者最好的方式。

trans-unit.resname: Patients see the SOAP notes you enter. If you wish to add notes only visible to doctors, please include them in the Additional Chart Notes section.
trans-unit.source: Patients see the SOAP notes you enter. If you wish to add notes only visible to doctors, please include them in the Additional Chart Notes section.
trans-unit.target: 请查看您输入的SOAP注释。如果您只想添加注释医生可见，请将其包括在<b>其他图表注释</ b>部分。

trans-unit.resname: In the unlikely event that the consult cannot be completed successfully or the patient behaves inappropriately, please flag the consult. This notifies us and ends the consult. Always inform your patient before you press the flag, as it will end the consult. Go ahead, try it now.
trans-unit.source: In the unlikely event that the consult cannot be completed successfully or the patient behaves inappropriately, please flag the consult. This notifies us and ends the consult. Always inform your patient before you press the flag, as it will end the consult. Go ahead, try it now.
trans-unit.target: 在不太可能的情况下，咨询不能成功完成或患者行为不当，请<b>标记咨询</ b>。这通知我们并结束咨询。始终通知您的患者，然后按<b>标志</ b>，因为它将结束咨询。去吧，现在尝试一下。

trans-unit.resname: When you click the 'Send & End Consult' button, the consult will end and your SOAP Note will be sent to the patient and become a part of their Patient's Chart. You can ask your patient to end the consult on their end so that you can take a few minutes to finish your SOAP Note. Then click this button when you are done.
trans-unit.source: When you click the 'Send & End Consult' button, the consult will end and your SOAP Note will be sent to the patient and become a part of their Patient's Chart. You can ask your patient to end the consult on their end so that you can take a few minutes to finish your SOAP Note. Then click this button when you are done.
trans-unit.target: 当您点击“发送和结束咨询”按钮时，<b>咨询将结束</ b> 并且您的SOAP注释将发送给患者，并成为其患者图表。您可以要求您的患者结束咨询以便您可以花几分钟时间完成SOAP 注释。然后点击这个按钮，当您完成后。

trans-unit.resname: Tip: Please remember to always start and finish every consult with a smile and warm greetings. When ending a consult, show patients that you care by asking if there's anything else you can do to help them.
trans-unit.source: Tip: Please remember to always start and finish every consult with a smile and warm greetings. When ending a consult, show patients that you care by asking if there's anything else you can do to help them.
trans-unit.target: 小贴士：请记住总是以微笑和温暖的问候来开始和完成每个咨询。结束咨询时，向患者显示出您确实在乎他们，通过询问是否有任何其他的您可以做的事情帮助他们。

trans-unit.resname: (Note: in an actual consult, this would trigger your earnings to go into your account, which gets disbursed monthly)
trans-unit.source: (Note: in an actual consult, this would trigger your earnings to go into your account, which gets disbursed monthly)
trans-unit.target: （注意：在实际咨询中，这将触发进入您的帐户的收入，其中获得支付是按月计算的）

trans-unit.resname: Once the consult has ended, you and the patient rate each other on a 5-star scale. At HealthTap, we strive for the highest standards, and the highest levels of customer satisfaction, so it’s important to maintain a high star ratings to retain your HealthTap Concierge license.
trans-unit.source: Once the consult has ended, you and the patient rate each other on a 5-star scale. At HealthTap, we strive for the highest standards, and the highest levels of customer satisfaction, so it’s important to maintain a high star ratings to retain your HealthTap Concierge license.
trans-unit.target: 一旦咨询结束，您和患者<b>相互评价</ b>在5星级内。在HealthTap，我们努力达到最高标准， 和最高水平的客户满意度，所以重要的是维持高的星级评分，以保留您的HealthTap Concierge许可证。

trans-unit.resname: It seems our plugin does not have permission to load in your browser. {link_tag_start}Click here{link_tag_end} to learn how to enable this.
trans-unit.source: It seems our plugin does not have permission to load in your browser. {link_tag_start}Click here{link_tag_end} to learn how to enable this.
trans-unit.target: 似乎我们的插件没有权限加载到您的浏览器。{link_tag_start}点击这里{link_tag_end}以了解如何启用这个。

trans-unit.resname: Do you see yourself? If not, click the white gear icon on the bottom left to check your camera settings.
trans-unit.source: Do you see yourself? If not, click the white gear icon on the bottom left to check your camera settings.
trans-unit.target: 您可以看到自己吗？如果没有，请单击左下角以检查相机设置。

trans-unit.resname: Do you see yourself? If not, click the white gear icon on the top left to check your camera settings.
trans-unit.source: Do you see yourself? If not, click the white gear icon on the top left to check your camera settings.
trans-unit.target: 您可以看到自己吗？如果没有，请单击左下角以检查相机设置。

trans-unit.resname: If you need additional support, please contact your IT department.
trans-unit.source: If you need additional support, please contact your IT department.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要额外的帮助，请联系您的信息技术部门。

trans-unit.resname: If you need additional support, please email {email_link_tag_start}{email}{link_tag_end} or call us at {phone}.
trans-unit.source: If you need additional support, please email {email_link_tag_start}{email}{link_tag_end} or call us at {phone}.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要其他支持，请发邮件到{email_link_tag_start}{email}{link_tag_end} 或致电{phone}.

trans-unit.resname: It seems like you are still having issues granting permission to the plug-in. Don't worry, continue now and someone from our team will call you later to help you set up your plug-in.
trans-unit.source: It seems like you are still having issues granting permission to the plug-in. Don't worry, continue now and someone from our team will call you later to help you set up your plug-in.
trans-unit.target: 您似乎仍然有问题关于授予的权限的插入。 别担心，现在继续，我们团队的人会稍后再致电给您，帮助您设置插件。

trans-unit.resname: Here are a few additional facts you should know: • Patients schedule appointments during your virtual office hours • Your next day’s schedule is sent by email at 9pm{appointments}
trans-unit.source: Here are a few additional facts you should know: • Patients schedule appointments during your virtual office hours • Your next day’s schedule is sent by email at 9pm{appointments}
trans-unit.target: 以下是您应该了解的一些其他事实：•患者计划您的在线办公时间内的约会•您的第二天的日程安排在下午9点通过电子邮件发送{appointments}

trans-unit.resname: Just like you're available when your real {clinic_slash}office is open, it's important that you're online and available during your designated Virtual Office Hours. Patients may be looking for you at these times. You do not have to be at your desk, simply sign in and set yourself as “available” on the HealthTap for Doctors mobile app. The app will ring when your patient calls.
trans-unit.source: Just like you're available when your real {clinic_slash}office is open, it's important that you're online and available during your designated Virtual Office Hours. Patients may be looking for you at these times. You do not have to be at your desk, simply sign in and set yourself as “available” on the HealthTap for Doctors mobile app. The app will ring when your patient calls.
trans-unit.target: 就像您在真正的{ clinic_slash }办公室开放时可用，重要的是，您在指定的在线期间在线可用办公时间。患者可能会在这些时间寻找您。您不一定要在您的办公桌，只需在HealthTap为医生设计的移动应用程序登录并将自己的状态设置为“可用”。应用程序会发出铃声当您的患者呼叫。

trans-unit.resname: Tip: The HealthTap for Doctors app is available to download for free on any mobile device or tablet for iOS and Android. You can start consults on your mobile device. At any time, you can continue the consult on your computer by going to your logged in homepage.
trans-unit.source: Tip: The HealthTap for Doctors app is available to download for free on any mobile device or tablet for iOS and Android. You can start consults on your mobile device. At any time, you can continue the consult on your computer by going to your logged in homepage.
trans-unit.target: 小贴士：HealthTap为医生设计的移动应用程序可供下载在iOS和Android的任何移动设备或平板电脑上均可免费下载。您可以在您的移动设备上开始咨询。在任何时候，您均可以继续您的计算机上的咨询，转到您登录的主页。

trans-unit.resname: You can set your shifts at your convenience, and you can change them at any time by clicking "Shift Schedule."
trans-unit.source: You can set your shifts at your convenience, and you can change them at any time by clicking "Shift Schedule."
trans-unit.target: 您可以选择在您最方便的时候设置班次，您可以随时通过点击“排班表”更改它们。

trans-unit.resname: You can set your virtual office hours at your convenience, and you can change them at any time. You can update your virtual office hours, set vacation days, and choose "unavailable" times by clicking "Practice Hours."
trans-unit.source: You can set your virtual office hours at your convenience, and you can change them at any time. You can update your virtual office hours, set vacation days, and choose "unavailable" times by clicking "Practice Hours."
trans-unit.target: 您可以在方便时设置<b>在线办公时间</ b>，并且您可以随时更改它们。通过单击“实践时间”，您可以更新您的在线办公室小时，设置假期日期。

trans-unit.resname: In addition to live virtual consults, you will also receive Inbox Consults. These are paid, detailed messages from your patients that appear at the top of your homepage feed and must be answered within 24 hours. You will earn $30 when you complete patient consults and submit your SOAP Note.
trans-unit.source: In addition to live virtual consults, you will also receive Inbox Consults. These are paid, detailed messages from your patients that appear at the top of your homepage feed and must be answered within 24 hours. You will earn $30 when you complete patient consults and submit your SOAP Note.
trans-unit.target: 除了实时在线咨询，您还将收到<b> 收件箱咨询 </ b>。这些是您患者付费的详细的消息， 显示在您的首页的顶部，必须在24小时答复。当您完成患者咨询并提交您的SOAP注释，您将赚到30美金。

trans-unit.resname: Inbox Consults are detailed questions from your patients that appear at the top of your homepage feed and must be answered within 24 hours. You can send clarification questions and have a conversation with the patients. To end the consult, simply submit the SOAP note.
trans-unit.source: Inbox Consults are detailed questions from your patients that appear at the top of your homepage feed and must be answered within 24 hours. You can send clarification questions and have a conversation with the patients. To end the consult, simply submit the SOAP note.
trans-unit.target: <b>收件箱咨询</ b>是关于您患者的详细问题， 他们将显示在您的首页的顶部，您必须在24小时答复。您可以发送解释性问题和和患者开启谈话。\要结束咨询，只需提交SOAP注释。

trans-unit.resname: Tip: Please respond to any Inbox Consults within 24 hours. Submit your answer as a SOAP consult note, or ask your patient follow-up questions by entering your question and clicking the “Wait for response” button.
trans-unit.source: Tip: Please respond to any Inbox Consults within 24 hours. Submit your answer as a SOAP consult note, or ask your patient follow-up questions by entering your question and clicking the “Wait for response” button.
trans-unit.target: 小贴士：请在24小时内回复所有收件箱咨询。提交您的答案作为SOAP咨询笔记，或问您的患者后续问题，通过输入您的问题和单击“等待响应”按钮。
